bib.title: Constraint Based Description of Polish Multiword Expressions.
bib.author: Kurc, Roman and Piasecki, Maciej and Broda, Bartosz
bib.abstract: We present an approach to the description of Polish Multi-word Expressions (MWEs) which is based on expressions in the WCCL language of morpho-syntactic constraints instead of grammar rules or transducers. For each MWE its basic morphological form and the base forms of its constituents are specified but also each MWE is assigned to a class on the basis of its syntactic structure. For each class a WCCL constraint is defined which is parametrised by string variables referring to MWE constituent base forms or inflected forms. The constraint
